過年吉祥話;guoh nian jyi shyang huah;New Year's blessings
祝你;juh nii;I wish you
祝福大家;juh fwu dah jia;I wish everyone
恭喜發財;gong shii fa tsair;Get rich and have great wealth
新年快樂;shin nian kuay leh;Happy New Year!
年年有餘;nian nian yeou yu;May every year be plentiful
財源廣進;tsair yuan goang jinn;Fortune comes from everywhere
萬事如意;wann shyh ru yih;All the best in your endeavors
招財進寶;jau tsair jinn bao;Good fortune and lots of money
心想事成;shin sheang shyh cherng;May your wishes come true
扭轉乾坤;neou joan chyan kuen;I hope your luck changes for the better
開春大吉;kai chuen dah jyi;Best of luck in the new year
迎春納福;yng chuen nah fwu;Good fortune in the new year
